name: Linear Labyrinth
description:
Created for C S 412 - Linear Prog/Convx Optimization

Controls - Mouse

Venture into the Linear Labyrinth! Use your knowledge of linear programming to maximize the damage of your spells! Just be careful not to exceed the constraints...

Features:
- An endless game of quick calculations
- 6 different spells
- 10 unique monsters
- Levels and level rewards to upgrade your spells
- No sound :(
